sql.data: SELECT osFamily ||' '|| osMajorVersion || ' ' || osMinorVersion AS osVersion, sum(serverCount) AS instances, count(osPatchVersion) AS versions FROM OS where osMajorVersion <> '' GROUP BY osFamily, osMajorVersion, osMinorVersion ORDER BY instances DESC
SELECT * FROM GV ORDER BY gatewayVersion ASC
SELECT * FROM NV ORDER BY probeVersion ASC
